title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
While the pasta is cooking, cook the bacon in a pan.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the bacon.
Remove the pan from the heat and mix in the egg and cheese mixture.

title: Chicken Fajitas
description: A Mexican-inspired dish with chicken and peppers.
instructions: Slice the chicken breast, bell peppers, and onion into thin strips.
Heat some oil in a large pan and cook the chicken until browned.
Add the bell peppers, onion, and fajita seasoning to the pan.
Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally.
Warm the tortillas and serve the fajita mixture with the tortillas and your choice of toppings.
